App.name: Buy Say Sell
App.pleaseConnect: Please connect your wallet to use.

BriefIntro.buyLong: Stories are owned. To own a story, buy it, or create one.
BriefIntro.sayLong: As the owner, now you can add content to the story. Say something.
BriefIntro.sellLong: List your story to the market. Your words value the story.

Home.emptyMarket: List your story to the market.
Home.emptyMy: Buy from the market or create one.

what.title: What
what.p1: Buy Say Sell is an altered social media. Here stories can be traded, and only the owner of a story can add content to it.

motivation.title: Motivation
motivation.p1: Human creates too much trash information on the Internet. A place for only valuable information is desired. By valuable we mean the words worth money. People pay to say, and say to make people pay.
motivation.p2: The reason to pay for saying can be either cooperative or competitive. One can make an interesting story beginning to attract lovers to continue the story, or make a debative story beginning to attract haters to express a different opinion. In both cases, the buyer needs to thoughtfully arrange their words to keep the story interesting so the story can be sold. By this mechanism, those boring garbage information makers are kept away from this social media.

tech.title: Technical Overview
tech.p1: Buy Say Sell is an EVM based decentralized application.
tech.p2: All the stores are stored and managed within the smart contract. Your stories will not be lost due to a shutdown or evilness of this project.
